amendatorysection.para: (1) Drug, veterans, mental health, driving under the influence, reentry, and other problem solving courts shall be subject to rules which shall be promulgated by the Supreme Court for procedures to be implemented in the administration of such courts.
(2) It is the intent of the Legislature that funds be appropriated separately to the Supreme Court for each of the problem solving courts to carry out this section and section 24-1301.
